Fire Starting.traditional: Friction fire (hand drill, bow drill), fire lay preparation, natural tinders
Fire Starting.salvage: Lighter/matches for ignition, metal containers for charcoal, temperature gauges

Watershed Mapping.traditional: Walk entire area, observe water flow, mark springs/streams with stakes
Watershed Mapping.salvage: GPS device, topographic maps, elevation apps, satellite imagery

Bloomery Iron.traditional: Build bloomery furnace from clay/stone, manual bellows, charcoal fuel
Bloomery Iron.salvage: Metal barrel for furnace, electric blower, infrared thermometer, pre-made charcoal

Water Wheel Basics.traditional: Hand-carved wooden wheel, stone bearings, hand-dug millrace
Water Wheel Basics.salvage: Salvaged wheel/pulley, ball bearings, PVC/metal pipes for millrace

Pottery Basics.traditional: Hand-build with local clay, pit fire or primitive kiln
Pottery Basics.salvage: Potter's wheel (salvaged), electric kiln or propane burner, ceramic supplies

Glassmaking.traditional: Build kiln from scratch, collect/refine silica sand, wood/charcoal fuel
Glassmaking.salvage: Propane burner, salvaged glass for melting, purchased silica, pyrometer
Glassmaking.notes: Salvaged glass melts easier than raw sand

Agriculture Fundamentals.traditional: Hand tools (sticks, stone hoes), natural fertilizer, manual irrigation
Agriculture Fundamentals.salvage: Metal tools (shovels, hoes), plastic piping, PVC irrigation, garden hose
Agriculture Fundamentals.notes: Metal tools vastly easier than wood/stone

Charcoal Production.traditional: Dig pit, stack wood, cover with earth, monitor for days
Charcoal Production.salvage: Metal drum with vents, temperature control, faster burn cycle

Rope & Cordage.salvage: Salvaged rope, paracord, wire rope, nylon line
Rope & Cordage.notes: No need to make rope with salvage available

Seed Banking.traditional: Hand-select seeds, clay pots for storage, cool dry cave/cellar
Seed Banking.salvage: Plastic containers, silica gel packets, freezer, vacuum sealer
